name: Saviour (ALeal)
description:
Saviour is an survival arcade game made in 72 hours for LudumDare 38 (Themed: "A small world").

Protect the last Tree of Life of your small world from those who want to destroy it. Use your weapons and be the saviour.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 - Change weapon
  • Left Shift - Speed Boost
  • Mouse - Aim and shoot (left click)
